title: Projects
content:
Projects are a collection of interrelated tasks to be run over a fixed period of time and within certain cost and other limitations, in order to reach a specific goal. For example, a complicated change such as upgrading network bandwidth to 1000Â MB/second could be managed as a project if many tasks are required to achieve this, or the tasks have a long duration or have a large financial cost. Project management helps you to create, manage, and track your project list, and manage its various attributes and relationships.

Related topics

  • Project workflow
  • How to create a project
  • How to edit a project
